languages.text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: Всякий раз, когда друкари получают {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или находятся под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}, они не могут использовать {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Сила от боли и теряют все ее {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Они также получают штрафы −(3 × бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}) к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и дополнительный урон от варп-атак и психосил в размере 10% от их максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} на 2 раунда.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to Weapon Skill and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

languages.text: Всякий раз, когда друкари получают {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или находятся под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}, они не могут использовать {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Сила от боли и теряют все ее {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Они также получают штрафы −(3 × бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}) к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и дополнительный урон от варп-атак и психосил в размере 10% от их максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} на 2 раунда.

Wenn Drukhari {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} erleiden oder von {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} beeinflusst werden, können sie Kraft durch Schmerz nicht einsetzen und verlieren 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}. Darüber hinaus erleiden sie −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-Bonus) auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und erhalten 2 Runden lang zusätzlich 10 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} Schaden durch Warp-Angriffe und psionische Kräfte.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer die Drukhari {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} erleiden oder von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräften{/g} beeinflusst werden, können sie Kraft durch Schmerz nicht einsetzen und verlieren sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, und zwar 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang. Darüber hinaus erleiden sie −(3× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-Bonus) auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und erhalten 2 Runden lang zusätzlich 10 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} Schaden durch Warp-Angriffe und psionische Kräfte.

languages.text: Chaque fois que les Drukharis subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} ou qu'ils sont affectés par des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, ils ne peuvent plus utiliser Pouvoir de la douleur et perdent tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} associés à cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. En outre, une pénalité de −(3 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}) s'applique à leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et à leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, tandis que les attaques Warp et les pouvoirs psychiques leur infligent 10 % de leur réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum points de dégâts supplémentaires pendant 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que les Drukhari subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} ou qu'ils sont affectés par des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, ils ne peuvent pas utiliser Pouvoir de la Douleur et perdent tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} associés à cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. En outre, une pénalité de -(3 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}) s'applique à leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et à leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}, tandis que les attaques warp et les pouvoirs psychiques leur infligent 10 % de leur réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum points de dégâts supplémentaires pendant 2 rounds.

languages.text: 当黑暗灵族受到{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}影响时，他们无法再使用痛苦之力，且失去此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}带来的所有加成效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 此外，他们的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}会降低（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}），在接下来的两轮内被灵能能力攻击，或遭受亚空间伤害时，会承受额外{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}伤害{/g}，等同于最大{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}生命值的{/g}10%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 当黑暗灵族受到{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}影响时，他们无法再使用痛苦之力，且失去此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}带来的所有加成效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 此外，他们的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}会降低（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}加值），在接下来的两轮内被灵能能力攻击，或遭受亚空间伤害时，会承受额外伤害，等同于最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的10%。

languages.text: Cuando los Drukhari sufren {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} o se ven afectados por {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}, no pueden usar Poder del dolor y pierden todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que les proporciona esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Además, sufren −(3 × bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}) a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y reciben un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas como daño adicional de ataques de disformidad y poderes psíquicos durante 2 asaltos.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Cuando los Drukhari sufren {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} o se ven afectados por {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}, no pueden usar Poder del dolor y pierden todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que les proporciona esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Además, sufren −(3 × bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}) a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y reciben un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas como daño adicional de ataques de disformidad y poderes psíquicos durante 2 asaltos.

languages.text: デュカーリが{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を受ける、または{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}に影響される場合は必ず、彼らはペインに由来するパワーを使うことができず、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}へのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を失う。 彼らはさらに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}ボーナス)となり、追加で2ラウンドの間、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の10%の<歪み>攻撃と超能力の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Drukhari suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or are affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they cannot use Power From Pain and lose all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. They additionally suffer −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} bonus) to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and receive an additional 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} damage from warp attacks and psychic powers for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリが{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}<歪み>のダメージ{/g}を受ける、または{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}に影響される場合は必ず、彼らはペインに由来するパワーを使うことができず、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}へのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を失う。 彼らはさらに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が −(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}ボーナス)となり、追加で2ラウンドの間、最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の10%の<歪み>攻撃と超能力のダメージを受ける。
